page.title: 16Public Transport
page.content: Southdown run one service between East Grinstead and Eastbourne, the 780, throughout the year. During term-time the 118 bus comes to the village to bring children to and from the Comprehensive School at Ringmer. The nearest railway stations are at Uckfield-6 miles and Lewes-10 miles. The nearest airport is at Gatwick- 30 miles. Newhaven-16 miles is a Seaport terminal with a regular sevice to Dieppe. Most people travel in private cars, either thier own or by arrangement with friends or neighbours.
